titles.title: A bill to authorize the certificate of documentation for the vessel Da Warrior (State of Hawaii registration number HA 161 CP) to be endorsed with a fishery endorsement.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5517-5518)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 103-77.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 118.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/5/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a fishery endorsement in connection with the documentation and coastwise endorsement authorized for a named vessel.
